mapper.select: SELECT MP.PO_CD "발주코드", TO_CHAR(MP.PO_REQDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "발주신청일", E.EMP_NM "발주신청인" FROM MT_PO MP, EMPLOYEE E, MT_CHK MK WHERE MP.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO AND MK.PO_CD(+) = MP.PO_CD AND MK.PO_CD IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT MCD.PO_CD "발주코드", MPD.PO_DTLCD "발주상세코드", MCD.CHK_CD "품질검사코드", MCD.MT_CD "자재코드", M.MT_NM "자재명", E.EMP_NM "담당인", MPD.PO_QTY "발주량", CC.CD_NM "상태" FROM MT_CHK_DTL MCD, MT_CHK MC, EMPLOYEE E, MT M, MT_PODTL MPD, COMM_CODE CC WHERE MCD.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND MCD.CHK_DTL_INSP = CC.COMM_CD AND MCD.PO_CD = MPD.PO_CD AND M.MT_CD = MPD.MT_CD AND MC.CHK_MNGR = E.EMP_NO AND MCD.CHK_DTL_INSP = 'MTRL01' ORDER BY 1

SELECT MCD.PO_CD "발주코드", MCD.CHK_CD "품질검사코드", MCD.MT_CD "자재코드", M.MT_NM "자재명", E.EMP_NM "담당인", TO_CHAR(MCD.CHK_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') "검사일", MPD.PO_QTY "발주량", MCD.CHK_PASS "합격량", MEL.CHK_ERRQTY "불량량", MEL.ERR_CD "불량코드", ERR.ERR_DTL "불량사유", MCD.CHK_DTL_INSP "상태" FROM MT_CHK_DTL MCD, MT M, EMPLOYEE E, MT_PODTL MPD, MT_ERRLIST MEL, ERR_CODE ERR, MT_CHK CHK WHERE MEL.CHK_CD = MCD.CHK_CD AND MEL.ERR_CD = ERR.ERR_CD AND MCD.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND MCD.PO_CD = CHK.PO_CD AND CHK.PO_CD = MPD.PO_CD AND CHK.CHK_MNGR = E.EMP_NO AND MCD.MT_CD = MPD.MT_CD AND MCD.PO_CD = MPD.PO_CD AND MCD.CHK_DTL_INSP = 'MTRL02' ORDER BY 6

SELECT PER.PROD_LOT AS "제품LOT", PID.PROD_CD AS "제품코드", P.PROD_NM AS "제품명", PPR.PROC_CD AS "공정코드", PC.EQ_CD AS "설비코드", PS.PROC_QTY AS "생산량", PS.PROC_PASSQTY AS "합격량", PE.ERR_QTY AS "불량량", PE.ERR_CD AS "불량코드", ERR.ERR_DTL AS "불량내역", PS.PROC_ST AS "상태"
FROM PROD_ERR PER, PROD_LOT PLO, PRD_INSDTL PID, PROC_PRC PPR, PROCESS PC, PROD P, PROC_ST PS, PROC_ERR PE, ERR_CODE ERR
WHERE PER.PROD_LOT = PLO.PROD_LOT AND PPR.PRD_DTLCD = PID.PRD_DTLCD AND PPR.PROC_CD = PC.PROC_CD AND PID.PROD_CD = P.PROD_CD AND PS.PROC_PRCD = PPR.PROC_PRCD AND PS.LINE_TURN = PPR.LINE_TURN AND PS.PRD_DTLCD = PPR.PRD_DTLCD AND PE.PROC_PRCD = PPR.PROC_PRCD AND PE.LINE_TURN = PPR.LINE_TURN AND PE.PRD_DTLCD = PPR.PRD_DTLCD AND PE.ERR_CD = ERR.ERR_CD

SELECT DISTINCT MCD.CHK_CD "품질검사코드", MCD.MT_CD "자재코드", M.MT_NM "자재명", E.EMP_NM "담당인", TO_CHAR(MCD.CHK_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') "검사일", MEL.CHK_ERRQTY "불량량", MEL.ERR_CD "불량코드", ERR.ERR_DTL "불량사유", V.VDR_NM "납품업체명", M.MT_PRC "단가", (M.MT_PRC * MEL.CHK_ERRQTY) "청구금액" FROM MT_CHK_DTL MCD, MT M, EMPLOYEE E, VENDOR V, MT_ERRLIST MEL, ERR_CODE ERR, MT_CHK CHK WHERE MEL.CHK_CD = MCD.CHK_CD AND MEL.MT_CD = M.MT_CD AND MEL.ERR_CD = ERR.ERR_CD AND M.VDR_CD = V.VDR_CD AND CHK.CHK_MNGR = E.EMP_NO AND MCD.CHK_DTL_INSP = 'MTRL02'
SELECT * FROM ERR_CODE WHERE ERR_NM LIKE '%' || #{errName} || '%'

SELECT MPD.PO_DTLCD AS "발주상세코드", MP.MT_CD AS "자재코드", MT.MT_NM AS "자재명", VDR.VDR_NM AS "업체명", MPD.PO_QTY "발주량" FROM MT_PODTL MPD, MT_PO MP, MT MT, VENDOR VDR WHERE MPD.PO_CD = MP.PO_CD AND MP.MT_CD = MT.MT_CD AND MP.VDR_CD = VDR.VDR_CD
AND MT.MT_NM LIKE '%' || #{mtName} || '%'
